# http://www.cisst.org/cisst/license.txt.

# --- end cisst license ---

set (REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES
     cisstCommon
     cisstCommonXML
     cisstVector
     cisstVectorQt
     cisstNumerical
     cisstOSAbstraction
     cisstMultiTask
     cisstMultiTaskQt
     cisstParameterTypes
     cisstParameterTypesQt
     cisstQt)

# cisst
FIND_PACKAGE(cisst REQUIRED ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})

if (cisst_FOUND_AS_REQUIRED)

  # cisst
  INCLUDE(${CISST_USE_FILE})  

  # for Qt generated header files
  include_directories (${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
  if (CISST_HAS_QT4)
    qt4_wrap_cpp (SAW_ATINETFT_QT_WRAP_CPP
                  ${sawATINetFT_HEADER_DIR}/mtsATINetFTQtWidget.h)
  else (CISST_HAS_QT4)
    set (CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
  endif (CISST_HAS_QT4)

  add_library (sawATINetFTQt
               ${sawATINetFT_HEADER_DIR}/mtsATINetFTQtWidget.h
               mtsATINetFTQtWidget.cpp
               ${SAW_ATINETFT_QT_WRAP_CPP})
  set_property (TARGET sawATINetFTQt PROPERTY FOLDER "sawATINetFT")
  cisst_target_link_libraries (sawATINetFTQt ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES})
  if (CISST_HAS_QT5)
    qt5_use_modules (sawATINetFTQt Core Widgets)
  endif (CISST_HAS_QT5)

  # make sure the new library is known by the parent folder to add to the config file
  set (sawATINetFTQt_LIBRARIES sawATINetFTQt PARENT_SCOPE)

else (cisst_FOUND_AS_REQUIRED)
  message ("Information: code will not be compiled, it requires ${REQUIRED_CISST_LIBRARIES}")
endif (cisst_FOUND_AS_REQUIRED)
